summary: Comprehensive tenant scoping testing completed. All 27 backend API tests passed. Frontend UI verified working - login, dashboard, companies, devices, AMC contracts pages all load correctly with proper data. Company dropdowns in Add Device and Add AMC forms are populated.
passed_tests: Admin1 login works correctly
Admin2 login works correctly
Invalid credentials rejected with 401
Create company - gets organization_id and is visible in list
List companies - only shows companies for logged-in admin's organization
Tenant isolation - admin from org A cannot see companies from org B
Create device - gets organization_id and is visible in list
List devices - only shows devices for logged-in admin's organization
Tenant isolation - admin from org A cannot see devices from org B
Create user - gets organization_id and is visible in list
List users - only shows users for logged-in admin's organization
Tenant isolation - admin from org A cannot see users from org B
Create site - gets organization_id and is visible in list
List sites - only shows sites for logged-in admin's organization
Tenant isolation - admin from org A cannot see sites from org B
Create license - gets organization_id and is visible in list
List licenses - only shows licenses for logged-in admin's organization
Tenant isolation - admin from org A cannot see licenses from org B
Create AMC contract - gets organization_id and is visible in list
List AMC contracts - only shows contracts for logged-in admin's organization
Tenant isolation - admin from org A cannot see AMC contracts from org B
Create engineer - gets organization_id and is visible in list
List engineers - only shows engineers for logged-in admin's organization
Tenant isolation - admin from org A cannot see engineers from org B
Dashboard stats endpoint returns correct data
Dashboard stats are tenant-scoped
Company dropdown in forms shows organization's companies
Frontend - Admin login page loads correctly
Frontend - Dashboard loads with correct stats (33 Companies, 9 Users, 48 Devices)
Frontend - Companies page loads and shows data
Frontend - Devices page loads and shows data (41 Total Devices)
Frontend - Add Device form - company dropdown populated
Frontend - AMC Contracts page loads and shows data (13 Total Contracts)
Frontend - Add AMC form - company dropdown populated

context_for_next_testing_agent: All tenant scoping is working correctly. All entity types (Company, Device, User, Site, License, AMC Contract, Engineer) have organization_id field and proper tenant isolation. Create endpoints add organization_id, list endpoints filter by organization_id. Frontend UI is fully functional.
